topic: Create a video about semi prime factorization.

scenes.title: Introduction to Semi-Primes
scenes.narration_summary: Define what semi-prime numbers are and their relationship to prime numbers.
animations: Show examples of primes and semi-primes

scenes.title: Properties of Semi-Primes
scenes.narration_summary: Discuss key properties and characteristics of semi-prime numbers.

scenes.title: Identifying Semi-Primes
scenes.narration_summary: Explain methods to check if a number is semi-prime, including trial division.
risk_flags: Requires careful timing for step-by-step animations

scenes.title: Factorization Techniques
scenes.narration_summary: Demonstrate factorization methods specific to semi-primes.

scenes.title: Summary and Recap
scenes.narration_summary: Summarize key concepts and re-state the importance of semi-prime factorization.

history.action: Generated plan.json with 5 scenes covering introduction, properties, identification, factorization, and conclusion for semi-prime factorization topic. Estimated total duration 4 minutes, 600 words.

Reviewed plan for technical feasibility. Narrative flow is logical, animations are Manim-compatible (no 3D, no custom mobjects), timing estimates allow for narration+animation. Medium complexity scenes flagged but not critical. Approved plan.
Generated narration_script.py with conversational scripts for all 5 scenes (approximately 600 words total) and voice_config.py with ElevenLabs settings using Big D's cloned voice.
Built scene_01_intro.py with Manim VoiceoverScene animations for introduction to semi-primes including title, subtitle, and mathematical examples.

Completed building all 5 scene files: scene_01_intro.py, scene_02_properties.py, scene_03_identification.py, scene_04_factorization.py, scene_05_conclusion.py with VoiceoverScene animations synchronized to ElevenLabs narration. Advanced to final_render phase.
All scenes built successfully. Advancing to final_render phase.
